author: josias
msg: added BaseURLModule which may be used to get the base url to prepend to urls in order to construct internal links. If the publication uses proxying, it returns the proxy url. Otherwise, it returns /context-path/pubid/area

author: rickhall
msg: Moved some checking code into the wire and out of the search policy core.

author: josias
msg: don't assume that internal links start with the context prefix. internal links should look like /pubid/area/doc-url (see also bug #31157)
